thread.section_title: Quicken Loans Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Quicken Loans | www.quickenloans.com | 6 of 287
thread.title: Michael Smith
thread.title_full: Quicken Loans reviewed by Michael Smith

author: Michael Smith
title: Michael Smith
text: I can't believe how quickly the company completed the process with me. They went out of the way to push me along and complete the process within 21 days. They have the point of view to satisfy the client. I went though a horrible ordeal with another company that I applied to. That company had the point of view that I needed them and they seemed suspicious of me throughout the process (PNC). I recommend Quicken 100 % if you expect customer service to be what it should be. They want your business and deserve it.
